metadata.Title: CVE-2013-2492

Platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12

metadata.Description: Stack-based buffer overflow in Firebird 2.1.3 through 2.1.5 before 18514, and 2.5.1 through 2.5.3 before 26623, on Windows allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted packet to TCP port 3050, related to a missing size check during extraction of a group number from CNCT information.
